hero.title: Our dental practice
hero.subtitle: YOUR WELL-BEING IS OUR PRIORITY, COMMITMENT, GOAL

cabinet.title: THE PRACTICE
points: We are here to prove that a visit to the dentist does not have to be a stressful and painful experience.
Our multilingual practice offers a range of treatments from simple to complex.
Striving to provide quality treatment, Vang dental practice is constantly evolving.
Every patient is welcomed with the attention they deserve!
cabinet.imageAlt: Modern consultation room - Vang Dental Clinic Luxembourg Limpertsberg

approach.title: OUR APPROACH
points: Your comfort and satisfaction are our top priorities.
Our approach is based on empathy and understanding.
We listen carefully to our patients' concerns.
We design personalized treatment plans that meet your unique needs.
approach.imageAlt: Dentist and patient - Personalized dental care Luxembourg

location.title: OUR LOCATION
location.address: 19, avenue de la Faïencerie, L-1510 Limpertsberg

car.title: Car
car.description: By car? Perfect, the large Glacis parking lot is a two-minute walk from our dental practice in Limpertsberg.

publicTransport.title: Public transport
publicTransport.description: Easy access by bus and tram.
